articles.author: Alyssa Boyle
articles.title: Google Won’t Pull Cookies In 2024 - AdExchanger
articles.description: Google announces it's delaying its self-imposed deadline to deprecate third-party cookies on Chrome for the third time.
articles.content:
Third-party cookie deprecation truly is a tale of The Boy Who Cried Wolf.
After delaying its self-imposed deadline to drop cookies on Chrome twice, Google announced on Tuesday it will push its cooki… [+3656 chars]
